text:
Working with Cornelius has been a real pleasure in terms of communication, transparency and fulfilment. If not for his suggestion, I would not have improved on my initial logo design. Also, the second picture is the sample patch shown to me which he insisted will be improved upon to bring up the quality of the wording.

I will definitely be coming back to Transcope for future restocks and new patch designs!

Great service, replies were prompt. I was consistently getting updates on the progress. Product was delivered in a timely manner. Definitely a quality product. Would recommend anybody who wants to get custom patches done to approach Corn. Will be back for more! Thank you ðŸ™‚

Cornelius was really helpful and even delivered all of the custom patches directly to my doorstep! Prior to the order, Cornelius attended to our requests professionally, such as getting a sample patch for us and making further edits to the design. Overall, a very reliable supplier and we are very pleased with our purchase!
It has been wonderful working with Cornelius for all these years. The ordering process has always been smooth and love the quality of their iron on patches.
Cornelius is very professional and communicates well. The patches he produces are very well made and he even do his best to QC the products. Very thankful for his service.
